call.connectionDelay: Connection can take up to ~2 minutes
call.enterPhoneFirst: Please enter a phone number first

account.accountInactiveMessage: Please top up your balance to activate your account and start making calls.

about.aboutDescription: Solity is an on-chain mobility service provider built on Solana. Users fund account in SOL, which settle transparently to the Solity Treasury. Our flagship product, SolityNET, lets you place global, low-latency voice calls with flexible caller identity options. Next, we're rolling out a suite of innovative mobility products that reject the usual corporate limitations, making connectivity more open, programmable, and user-controlled.
about.solityNetDescription: SolityNET is a comprehensive solution to decentralize global telephony. At launch, calling will be available in the US and Canada. We can onboard 80+ countries, but to avoid overloading the network we'll expand coverage gradually - adding regions day by day.
about.scalingDescription: What's planned for the server and our general scaling map.

modal.inCallClickToShow: In call - Click to show call modal

support.telegramDescription: Join our community chat for quick support and updates
support.discordDescription: Connect with other users and get technical help
support.twitterDescription: Follow us for the latest news and announcements
support.sessionLogsDescription: If you contact support, include your session logs to help us resolve issues faster.
support.noLogsAvailable: No logs available - session just started

scaling.updateDescription: Edit the JSON in updatesData (near the bottom of this file) to keep this list fresh.

solityNetCall.title: SolityNET Call
solityNetCall.description: We're rolling out the SolityNET calling feature to the public. It took just three months to go from idea to live product - our first step toward becoming the leading crypto-native mobility provider.

coverageIncrease.title: SolityNET Coverage Increase
coverageIncrease.description: Daily coverage expansions are planned. 40+ countries are queued for rollout. We'll post day-by-day updates on X.

solityNetApi.title: SolityNET API
solityNetApi.description: Opening up the SolityNET API brings full integration flexibility. Hook up your own systems - or connect an AI assistant that can place calls on your behalf, from ordering pizza to scheduling business meetings.

solityNetSms.title: SolityNET SMS
solityNetSms.description: Decentralized outbound SMS is fully feasible and in active development. As with calling, we're focusing on sending only; we won't support inbound SMS reception to avoid potential exposure of personal information.

aiAssistant.title: Solity AI Assistant
aiAssistant.description: A test launch of the AI assistant is planned before eSIM, since it's a core mobility feature. It can replace voicemail, screen incoming calls as your gatekeeper, and handle simple tasks like \"book a table\" or \"order pizza.\"

esimUs.title: Solity eSIM US
esimUs.description: The United States will be our first eSIM market, offering direct telephony with unique/custom extension numbers. Global coverage is a key goal on our roadmap.

phase1.title: Phase 1 | Foundation
phase1.subtitle: Now → 100 concurrent calls
features: Stable core dialer + billing in SOL

balance.title: Balance
balance.lowBalance: Low balance — please top up before a call.
balance.paymentSubmittedDesc: Your payment has been successfully submitted to the Solana network.
balance.processingTime: It may take up to 10 minutes to process. Please wait patiently while your balance is updated.
balance.problemsContact: If you experience any problems with the payment, please
balance.createFirstInvoice: Create your first invoice by adding balance above.
balance.searchRates: Search by direction, codes, or route...
balance.noRatesFound: No rates found matching your search.
balance.paymentProcessingMessage: Your {amount} payment is being processed. Top-up buttons are disabled until processing completes (up to 10 minutes).

login.description: Onchain telecommunication company providing worldwide service. Solana ecosystem based. Private calls any number to any number.
login.fillAllFields: Please fill in all required fields
login.usernameTooShort: Username must be at least 3 characters long
login.usernameTooLong: Username must be no more than 30 characters long
login.usernameInvalidFormat: Only letters, numbers and underscores allowed
login.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 12 characters long
login.passwordNeedsUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
login.passwordNeedsLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
login.passwordNeedsDigit: Password must contain at least one digit
login.passwordNeedsSpecial: Password must contain at least one special character
login.recaptchaUnavailable: reCAPTCHA not available. Please try again.
login.recaptchaFailed: reCAPTCHA verification failed. Please try again.
